contentList.content: Item Shipment Framework Mailbox
Stores items added by mod authors.
An unseen volition flows through this mystical box, drawing items shipped from the aether.
A mailbox has been added to your camp chest.
A mailbox has been moved to your camp chest.
[1] has shipped new items to your mailbox.
Item Shipment Framework Utilities
This container holds various spell scrolls, each of which will trigger a different Item Shipment Framework command.
Refill Player 1's Mailbox
Refill Player 2's Mailbox
Refill Player 3's Mailbox
Refill Player 4's Mailbox

Use this scroll to refill the inventory of Player 1's Item Shipment Framework Mailbox.

It will force the Item Shipment Framework to respawn every item added to the camp chest by mod authors.

Use this scroll to refill the inventory of Player 2's Item Shipment Framework Mailbox.

It will force the Item Shipment Framework to respawn every item added to the camp chest by mod authors.

Use this scroll to refill the inventory of Player 3's Item Shipment Framework Mailbox.

It will force the Item Shipment Framework to respawn every item added to the camp chest by mod authors.

Use this scroll to refill the inventory of Player 4's Item Shipment Framework Mailbox.

It will force the Item Shipment Framework to respawn every item added to the camp chest by mod authors.
Uninstall Item Shipment Framework

Use this scroll to uninstall the Item Shipment Framework.

It will attempt to move all of the items currently inside of each mailbox directly into the associated camp chest, then it will remove all of the mailboxes. Making it safe to uninstall the mod from your game.
Spawn Tutorial Chest contents in Mailbox
Use this scroll to spawn the contents of the Tutorial Chest into the Item Shipment Framework Mailboxes.

Starting uninstall procedure.

Mailboxes will be deleted; do you want their items to be moved to the camp chests?

Are you sure you want to uninstall the mod?

You can instead disable it through its JSON configuration file, as explained in the mod page.

You are aware that reinstalling this mod later on may cause a minority of mods to resend their items.

Item Shipment Framework has been uninstalled.

You may now safely remove the mod from your load order.
Tutorial Chest

This "Tutorial Chest" will be reset upon saving and loading your game.

It serves as legacy mod compatibility, for those mods which have not been updated to support the Item Shipment Framework.
